opt.about: See bulkfiles_template.xml for further documentation. See site_defaults for included configurations.
opt.title: SGD Lite
opt.doc:
Bulkfiles Example: # get software curl -O http://eugenes.org/gmod/GMODTools/GMODTools-1.0.zip unzip GMODTools*.zip
# load a genome chado db to Postgres database curl -O http://sgdlite.princeton.edu/download/sgdlite/sgdlite.sql.gz createdb sgdlite (gunzip -c sgdlite.sql.gz | psql -d sgdlite -f - ) >& log.load
# extract bulk files from database cd GMODTools perl -Ilib bin/bulkfiles.pl -conf sgdbulk -make
# if failed perl -Ilib bin/bulkfiles.pl -conf sgdbulk -make -debug \ |& mail -s gmodtools-debug gilbertd@indiana.edu
